comment: Super nice and not too tough of a grader unless you go against her narrative, doesn't really like papers that disagree with want she find objectively true.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: The kindest professor I have ever had! She is such a kind woman. Is very open with change due dates for important papers, and focuses on student success. You will not regret taking her.

This teacher is truly into English, however the class is overshadowed by a lot of political stuff. If you are into highly debated topics in the U.S then this class is for you as you will get a large in depth look at several topics. She is certainly helpful but at times the class feels like a drag and like a political debate.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: She is a great professor and very understanding. She is clear of what she wants from you. For this semester, we wrote 4 papers and had a discussion post due every week over a passage or book we read. Attendance is worth 5%. Great professor and great feedback.

Cool topics to write on. I like writing but she helped me learn how to write better and to be more secure in my abilities. She cares and is passionate about the subject. I have taken her twice! She understands that some of us have full course loads and doesn't want to see you fail. First hybrid I took and the best ever!!! Save a day and take her!!!

FYI, with all English classes, attendance is mandatory. She is very understanding. If you miss communicate with her. She gives the mandatory amount of essays, but guides you through them. Occasional extended deadlines and extra credit. She is well read and assignments fit social issues. Your writing will greatly improve. English for Engineers! 100%
The class is extremely easy. The professor is amazing and offers a lot of extra credit. If you go to class she will ocationally call on you and has good discussions.  Take Her. EASY A

Professor Swint is an excellent teacher, who took additional time to help her students understand the art of writing, speech delivery, & with peer review the class reached their greatest potential. We had alot of writing assignments & speeches, but it brought the best out of us. She taught us writing with excellence is valuable than being mediocre.
